meta_description: The Jacoby Arts Center mission is to nurture & promote the practice and appreciation of the arts through education, exhibits, cultural programs, & community outreach initiatives.
collections_text:
##### New location NOW OPEN!  
JAC State Street Studios at 208 State Street  
in Downtown Alton.  
Winter Gallery Hours: Saturday 12-4pm

##### Get updates via email & join us at Jacoby!

[Sign Up ](https://www.zeffy.com/ticketing/join-us-at-jacoby)
